price: 72. Waa kuwa aan furin markhaati been ah, markay maqlaanna wax uun hadal macno darro ah ku mara sharaf (ka jeesada).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِٱللَّغۡوِ مَرُّواْ كِرَامٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna lā yashhadūna al-zūra wa-idhā marrū bil-laghwi marrū kirāman
